description.value:
Should you take damage from Saving a Target as a desperate action, the following happens:

  • You can spend 1 of your Rest Dice to restore your Hit Points.
  • You can spend 1 of your Rest Dice to restore the saved target’s Hit Points.
  • Gain 1 @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Die.
  • If the saved target would have fallen unconscious before you intervened, you can make an opportunity attack against the attacker as a non-action.
  • If you fall unconscious from the attack, the saved target regains Hit Points up to half of the damage dealt to you.
  • If you are Killed Instantly, the protected creature learns one of your Mantras permanently assigned to the Eikonic Number that you had it assigned to. They know this Mantra so long as you are dead.

system.requirements: Must have a Cleric Adept Ability
